title: Workshop on Core Competency Design for Project Managers Using Web-Based Delphi Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic project management theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: A learner-participatory online workshop systematically deriving and validating project management competencies while analyzing language domain application cases

learning_goals: Extract five or more project management competency elements by applying a two-stage web-based Delphi method survey process
Select and justify 10 competencies applicable to the linguistic domain from 42 core competencies derived through small-group collaboration
Submit a project-based assessment design for a project manager training program based on Delphi method results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
